oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-07-03 - KOMA
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances from the Oklahoma Round-up, featuring Ann Bond, Lexie Lou and Ray, Charlie Aldrich, and Chuck Davis and His Curbsitters, recorded on July 3, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ann Bond; Lexie Lou and Ray; Charlie Aldrich; Chuck Davis and His Curbsitters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Great Roundup In The Sky ([Unidentified]) (incomplete) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Riley Shepard talks -- Ann Bond talks -- Riley Shepard talks -- Hideaway In Happy Valley (Lexie Lou and Ray) -- Riley Shepard talks -- Rescue The Perishing (Ann Bond, Lexie Lou, and Charlie Aldrich) -- Riley Shepard talks -- The Arkansas Traveler (Chuck Davis and His Curbsitters) -- Riley Shepard talks -- [Unidentified] talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Shepard, Riley; Bond, Ann; Oklahoma Sweethearts (Musical group); Aldrich, Charlie; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975
